titles.title: New York Fair Fishing Act
To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add New York to the New England Fishery Management Council, and for other purposes.
New York Fair Fishing Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: New York Fair Fishing Act - Amends the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add the state of New York as a member of the New England Fishery Management Council.
